infantry.description: Soldiers who make up the backbone of any ground force.

artillery.description: Heavy gun batteries that can support infantry attacks.

tank.description: Armored units that pack a major punch.

aa.description: Gun batteries that shoot down invading air units.

fighter.description: Small, fast aircraft that threaten everything on land or sea.

bomber.description: Mammoth, long-range aircraft that drop bombs on their targets.

battleship.description: Powerful and nearly indestructible monarchs of the sea.

destroyer.description: Small, fast warships that hunt submarines.

carrier.description: Giant seaborne platforms from which fighters can take off and land.

transport.description: Vulnerable troop carriers to shuttle human cargo.

sub.description: Predators that attack from beneath the surface.
